attributes.additional_details:
Re-open many of the railway lines and stations closed in the 60's to give better transport links.

e.g. Somerset & Dorset line in particular the section Blandford Form to Poole. Bath to Shepton Mallett.

Lines in North Devon onward from Barnstaple to Ilfracombe, Bideford, Torrington and Okehampton to Bude and Exeter.

Re-open stations at Corsham, Wellington (Somerset) and Wotton Bassett.

The Waverley Route in its complete length and the Woodhead Route.

Many other routes and stations to numerous to mention.
